page.title: 11Local news LISVANE
page.content: {MAY-JUNE 1985.Community Council} propose to oppose supper licence for Griffin Inn.Residents complained about way house was run,reprsentations made to brewery,copies to police,city envi- ronment officer.No application made -Whitbread brewery promise to investi- gate complaints.Collection of money made in aid of famine relief in Ethio- pia during services at Lisvane Baptist Church.Owing to increased number of burgaries in village,clerk of Commun- ity Council instructed to ask police sperintendent at Llanishen to increase number of patrols particularly foot patrols,after dark.The Lisvane News- letter indicated great concern about preserving the quality of{villagelife, strengthening the sense of community, improving existing amenities and prov- iding extra leisure and recreational facilities,especially for young people
